mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REWARD_AND_PUNISH(reward_and_punish_id, reward_or_punish, rp_stu_id, rp_content, rp_time) VALUES(#{rewardAndPunisId}, #{rewardOrPunis}, #{rpStuId}, #{rpContent}, #{rpTime})
